item.title: Ethel
item.description:
About This Game

AVERAGE TIME TO COMPLETE: 2hrs 30m

DIFFICULTY: This game demands a high level of concentration and memory retention making it suitable for those seeking a rewarding and intellectually engaging gaming experience. It may not be suitable for individuals who prefer games without defined objectives or prompts.



You take on the role of Thomas Myrtle a World War II veteran. The war left him not only with physical wounds, but also with the invisible scars of PTSD. Despite his bravery on the battlefield, Thomas returned home only to find himself battling a different enemy: addiction. This addiction took a toll on his marriage, eventually leading to its dissolution, and plunged him into a spiral of homelessness.

In 1949, a glimmer of hope emerged when Thomas's grandparents took him in and helped him achieve sobriety. For a brief period, life seemed to regain some semblance of normalcy. However, this fragile peace was shattered when Thomas woke up one morning to find his grandmother accusing him of stealing her medication. Despite his protestations of innocence, suspicion tainted the air.

That fateful night, Thomas awoke in his grandmother's room, surrounded by a pool of blood, with no memory of what had transpired. His grandmother was nowhere to be found, and Thomas was haunted by the terrifying possibility that his PTSD and addiction had driven him to commit a heinous act.

Consumed by guilt, confusion, and fear, Thomas went into hiding, cutting himself off from the world for over a decade. Now, after twelve long years of self-imposed exile, he returns, determined to unravel the mystery of that fateful night and to seek closure, if any can be found. With a tumultuous past weighing heavily on his shoulders, Thomas embarks on a journey of self-discovery, confronting demons both internal and external as he seeks answers and redemption.



Gameplay:

**Immersive Exploration**: Dive into a meticulously crafted, eerie house, where every corner holds secrets waiting to be uncovered.

**Compelling Mystery**: Piece together the events of a tragic night by gathering clues scattered throughout the environment.

**Terrifying Atmosphere**: Experience spine-chilling moments as you navigate through an environment filled with unexplainable phenomena and unsettling sound design.

**Interactive Horror**: Engage with the environment and trigger paranormal events, blurring the lines between reality and the supernatural.

**Mind-Bending Puzzles**: Test your wits with challenging puzzles that require keen observation to solve.

**Psychological Tension**: Encounter psychological horror elements that will keep you on the edge of your seat, questioning your own sanity.

**Rich Narrative**: Unravel a captivating storyline through environmental storytelling and discovered documents, immersing yourself in the haunting narrative.

**Replayability**: Explore branching pathways and discover different endings.

**Unforgettable Horror**: Brace yourself for an unforgettable horror experience, filled with suspense, dread, and moments that will stay with you long after the game ends.

item.title: The Dawn Of A Flower
item.description:
About This Game

◆ What kind of game is the 'The Dawn Of A Flowe'? ◆
The Dawn Of A Flowe is a love simulation game about an Egyptian princess who has been forced to dress up as a man due to unavoidable circumstances. As the story progresses, there are many options, and you can decide the fate of the protagonist through Choice.

Depending on your choice, she can sometimes fall into futility like a flower that is quickly thrown away, or she can bloom proudly and become a pharaoh. Maybe you can abandon everything and leave to find a new way.

Only You Can Change Her Future.

◆ Plot ◆

A murdered queen. A princess turned away by the pharaoh.
Left alone in the cold reality, she became a prince to survive.

After overcoming a lonely time of struggle, ahead of the coming-of-age ceremony, she is threatened with her life by someone.

Mysterious abilities awakened at a moment of crisis. And three men approaching her.

Who should I trust and who should I be wary of?

Who is the culprit and what is his purpose?

◆ Character◆

.
→ Prince "denech"
"it's None Of Your Business. Get Off Me!"
The royal family's headache with harsh speech and extreme behavior.
In the wake of an incident, he and the main character are in a rough relationship.

→ Information Award "enrim"
"who Bullied My Princess?"
Thebes' Most Famous Information Award.
He's Good At Speaking In A Light Way,
A Slick and Incoherent Personality.

→ General "tamuz"
"i'm Worried About You."
A Friendly General Devoted to the Protagonist

◆ Game Features ◆

* A story that gives a sense of freshness and immersion with Egyptian background fusion fantasy material
* Watercolor style illustration background with cozy yet unique texture
* Two vocal songs and a calm and mysterious piano-centered original BGM
* Various mini-games such as card matching, brick breaking, rhythm games, etc
* The future of the protagonist changes according to choice. Multi-Ending

item.title: FAST BEAT BATTLE RIDER
item.description:
About This Game

"Super-highspeed-battle" among motorcycles on highways in Asia.
That is the “Ring-shaped FASTBEAT BATTLE RIDER”!
The popular motorbike game in the arcade is back on PC!
Players become original characters, and through leveling up and customization, they can create their "own character" and their "own bike" to aim to become No. 1.
In this game, cars on the highway may get in your way during battles.
Getting caught in cars is very dangerous, but dodging them successfully will increase the player's speed!
Improve your technique and turn a difficulty into an opportunity, and defeat your rivals!

■Story mode

The story consists of 36 episodes.
Defeat the rivals (COM) that stand in your way one after another!

item.title: What?!
item.description:
About This Game

The moon shines as the midnight wind blows through the half-opened window. A stern figure sits in a brown leather chair and lights up a cigar.

A rustle of newspaper and a gleam in the figure's eye... A new case has presented itself, and it's detective is ready.

Patty "Pat" Irvin sweeps out of his chair and collects his things. His thirst for solving crime is about to be sated.

What is What?!?

What?! is a single-player mystery game that focuses on its compact story and unconventional solutions. Players will take on the role of Pat Irvin, a ditzy private investigator struggling to maintain his family business.

Players will have access to four full cases, and an additional tutorial case, with each case evolving upon existing ideas while remaining distinct.



Made By: Trevor, Miles, Leena, Joon, Cathy, Darcy, Emily, Yunfei

Music by @malakazam_

With special thanks to Justin and Teresa

item.title: Baskerville
item.description:
About This Game

In the early 2030s, an event named The Fall shook London and introduced humanity to Vornovians, extraterrestrial beings from Proxima Centauri. What began as a misunderstanding escalated into a human-Vornovian conflict, resolved after 18 months through diplomacy, allowing coexistence and collaboration. Peace has endured for two decades, with Vornovians becoming integral parts of Earth's society.



Sherr-Lok, a detective with unconventional methods, aids the Doyle District Detective Bureau and offers private investigative services. Watt-Sun, once a frontline soldier, battled a decade of homelessness and PTSD before Sherr-Lok mentored him into becoming a detective.

Sherr-Lok and Watt-Sun's next journey sees them navigate a mysterious case involving Peter Baskerville, heir to the infamous Baskerville Hall, just mere months after the death of his uncle. Threats against Peter's life provide the backdrop for a captivating narrative filled with escaped prisoners, shadowy organisations, and a supposed curse that has lasted over 200 years. Sherr-Lok and Watt-Sun take on the case and fight to find the truth behind the long-running mystery.



FEATURES

Save/Load System: Safeguard your progress and continue your adventure at your convenience.
Questions: Navigate through a story that challenges players to prove their knowledge, with correct answers determining unknown consequences.
Music Gallery: Immerse yourself in the game's ambience with a curated soundtrack by Cameron Keywood, brought to life by the musical talents of Tim Beek.

item.title: Secret Odyssey: Orb of Eternity
item.description:
About This Game

GAMESTORY:

A diverse team embarks on an epic quest through the heart of a mysterious Quantum Complex, each sector revealing enigmatic challenges that test their unity and intellect. As they navigate through bewildering passageways filled with advanced technology and ancient secrets, they discover truths that forge stronger bonds among them, realizing the journey itself is the key to their mission.
With every new sector conquered, the complex's trials intensify, reducing the ranks of the team as only the most resilient and cunning advance. The hidden portals become scarcer, and the puzzles more intricate, leaving behind a select few who, through perseverance and wit, move closer to the core, where the ultimate mystery awaits.
In the dimming light and shifting shadows of the complex, a solitary figure emerges as the last of his team to master the cryptic sectors. His resolve, strengthened by each triumph and loss, compels him to face the challenges alone, a plethora of hidden puzzles standing between him and his elusive goal. With determination as his sole ally, his true quest unfolds, beckoning him to unlock the mysteries that lie at the very heart of this enigmatic world.
Alone, the last stalwart explorer pushes forward through the vast chamber, a series of cryptic challenges arrayed before him. His journey, laden with concealed obstacles and unforeseen trials, is just beginning.



For centuries, countless adventurers have ventured into its depths, drawn by the allure of ancient mysteries and the thrill of the challenge, yet none have returned to share their story.
This brave soul, a master puzzle-solver with a curious mind and a heart full of courage, steps into the mysterious sector not for glory but to uncover a secret hidden within the complex's core.
As this intrepid explorer ventures deeper, he realizes that the sector is not just a collection of rooms but a sentient entity, alive with the oldest mysteries. Each sector presents a unique challenge, ranging from intricate puzzles that alter the very fabric of the complex, to arcane riddles that require not just intellect but the wisdom of ages to solve.

GAMEPLAY:

Diverse Puzzle Mechanics: Players will navigate through an intricate network of challenges, encountering a broad spectrum of puzzles. These include environmental puzzles that transform the game's architecture, intricate mazes demanding strategic navigation, logic puzzles for cracking codes, spatial challenges testing geometric intuition, and complex conundrums that push problem-solving skills to the edge.



Exploration Rewards: Venturing off the beaten path reveals concealed chambers and secret passages. These hidden areas offer vital clues to the complex's origins, grant power-ups to support the quest, or provide strategic shortcuts to circumvent daunting obstacles.

Interactive Gameplay Dynamics: The game integrates dynamic environmental effects, such as changing lighting and reflections, which play critical roles in puzzle resolution. Certain mysteries and pathways emerge only under specific conditions, encouraging players to manipulate their surroundings to progress.

Atmospheric Audio and Narration: The narrative depth is enriched with ambient soundscapes and nuanced voiceovers. The protagonist's thoughts and discoveries are conveyed through immersive voice acting, enhancing engagement with the storyline and the ancient secrets of the complex.

Enhanced Gaming Features:

Gamepad Compatibility: Offers flexible control schemes to accommodate a wide range of players, ensuring a seamless and engaging experience.
Dynamic Visuals: Leveraging lighting and reflection not merely for aesthetics but as essential puzzle components, adding layers of complexity to exploration.
Rich Sound Design and Voice Performance: Deepens the narrative immersion, providing auditory clues, setting the tone, and breathing life into the characters.

Narrative Resolution:

In the climax, the protagonist discovers the Quantum Complex's true purpose: safeguarding the ancient cyber orb, an artifact of immense power that harmonizes reality with the digital domain. The final ordeal requires not just reaching this elusive level but mastering the complex puzzles that have protected the orb for eons.
This quest becomes legendary, transcending a mere hunt for a mythical object to embody profound enlightenment. Players finish not only as victors but as enlightened individuals, transformed by their journey to uncover a relic that bridges ancient wisdom with future technology.

item.title: Rescue: The Beagles
item.description:
About This Game

A cargo airplane crashed somewhere in the vast areas of the Amita mountain range. It was carrying a large shipment of beagles headed to the CutLab, a huge animal testing facility. The lab is upset about losing its precious testing material and is deploying a biohazard division determined to reclaim its "property". They operate under strict orders: seize usable specimens, dispose of the rest! We are sending our elite animal rescue squad to save as many dogs as possible before the lab's grunts confine them back to the life of endless misery.
Go!



Rescue: The Beagles is a challenging platformer/runner with unique parallax based gameplay. The game offers core gaming experience focused on score attacks and reaching high levels, paying homage to classic 8-bit era arcades. Play as Nicole or Edwin and rescue as many adorable doggies as possible. Overcome treacherous mountain terrain by parkouring, roping and parachuting in an intense, fast paced chase through colorful procedurally generated levels. Command owls and wield them as a weapon against a horde of biohazard dudes, vivisectors, lab executives and more. Upgrade your skills and consume wild goji berries to gain superpowers!

WARNING! The player can perish by falling from heights. It may happen a lot to rookies but resolute rescuers will prevail. You have been warned!

Features:

  • Challenging yet flowy action inspired by classic 8-bit arcade games
  • Unique gameplay based on scrolling parallax
  • Stylish minimalist graphics
  • Procedurally generated levels and color palettes, offering a lot of replay value and mood variation
  • Shared screen two player Co-Op and PvP modes. Team up or compete with a friend
  • Configurable PvP rules and winning conditions
  • Skill system to boost your rescuing abilities as you advance through levels. It includes essential life skills such as Beagle Magnetism and Goji Berry Digestion
  • Endless supply of beagles to rescue

Trivia:

  • The initial Rescue: The Beagles prototype was created way back in 2008 for a prominent game jam. It was built from scratch in only two weeks. The Beagles won the jam, amongst hundreds of entries!
  • The game's story was inspired by real events. An actual beagle abuse incident took place at a veterinary institute in developer's hometown. The news about it hit the front pages and caused public outrage. Near that time the developer Nenad was regularly hiking the Alps. On one such hike, a heated discussion about beagles took place. This created an unlikely fusion of beagles and mountain peaks in Nenad's head and thus the game idea was born.

item.title: Wildlife Matters
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a captivating global adventure as a young ranger, dedicated to rescuing captured animals. Your noble quest leads you to awe-inspiring locations - forgotten caves, ancient temples, rare safaris, wild jungles, and breathtaking waterfalls. But hold on tight, as that's just the tip of the iceberg!



EXPLORE CONTINENTS

Take your journey to new heights as you traverse mysterious Asia, discover the exotic wonders of Africa, and marvel at the beauty of North America. Each continent presents unique puzzles, challenges and surprises, adding layers of excitement to your wildlife-saving adventure.

PUZZLE CHALLENGE

Engage your intellect with our next-gen puzzling experience. Solve hundreds of innovative puzzles that will test your skills and unravel the mysteries of each location. Are you up for the challenge?

STUNNING RETRO ATMOSPHERE

Immerse yourself in a world of tranquility and beauty with stunning visuals and authentic audio. Feel the environments come to life as you navigate through serene landscapes on your mission to make a positive impact.

item.title: Museum Mystery: Deckbuilding Card Game
item.description:
About This Game

Museum Mystery is a fusion between deckbuilding rogulite game and narrative adventure with intriguing secrets waiting for you to uncover.



Your first night as a museum security guard takes a disastrous turn.
Animated exhibits, awakened gods, and total chaos. And it’s your job to restore order until dawn.

Explore Various Eras

Museum halls are portals into history. Literally. Walk through each era, from Ancient Egypt to the 19th century, to find the roots of what’s happening.

Battle With Unique Enemies

Museum exhibits have come to life. And most of them are mad. Try to calm down this amazing pieces of art.

Master Hundreds of Cards

Find cards of ancient artifacts or practices. Combine them, unlock new mechanics and craft your perfect hand.

Adventure Through History and Art

Talk with historical figures, complete side-quests and help legendary characters!

Features

  • 4 historical eras to explore
  • 150+ cards to create the best deck possible
  • Unique relics that give unprecedented power

Can you solve this Mystery?

item.title: Zofia
item.description:
About This Game

Zofia is a first person RPG - Kick, magic, and melee your enemies as a Seeker trying to stop the blight - A dangerous magical corruption that's determined to bend you to its will.

Features


  • Play the campaign solo or co-operatively with 4 players online, or 2 players in local split screen.
  • Utilize elemental magic based on your surroundings. Create traps or obstacles for your opponents, or use magic to layer your armor or even launch yourself out of danger. Rare magic tomes allow you to further your magical abilities, if you can find some.



  • Use a grapplehook to get high locations, shortcuts, or secrets... Or as a means to board airships!
  • Create a custom character from 4 different races, each with their own advantages and disadvantages. From the slow but powerful slime-like Tarbies, to the agile and flying Aves... Or maybe the small and nimble Otter-like Common are for you.



  • Build up your Hub base by finding secret treasures.
  • Take on enemies with a wide variety of weapons, from elemental weapons, firearms, magic medallions, to ancient equipment.
  • Bosses, quests, and Gods await you... What will you find, Seeker?

item.title: IVRI
item.description:
About This Game

IVRI immerses players in a gripping space adventure where they navigate an eerie, abandoned space station, meticulously piecing together the puzzle of the missing crew and uncovering the enigmatic secrets hidden within the ship's walls, delivering an enthralling narrative experience.

A Space Narrative Horror Game:
● 20+ rooms to explore
● Windows 95 aesthetic
● Fun puzzles
● Time travel shenanigans
● Humorous dialogue
● Eerie and Cute

Enter the chilling world of IVRI, a gripping horror game where you embody Ollie Rex on a mission to uncover clues about the vanished crewmates. But as you delve deeper, an ominous presence lurks aboard the ship, trailing your every move and unleashing chaos at every turn.

item.title: A Step From Insanity

item.title: Midnight Monitor: Aldercourt
item.description:
About This Game




Aldercourt City Council, in association with Sequre Transport Authority, welcome you into Aldercourt Station.

Aldercourt Station is a sprawling and expansive addition to London's Travel Network. Come get lost amonst its tile halls and take in the scenery as you pass through its liminal spaces.

It can be a little difficult to find your way through the station however - Follow the signs, keep your eyes open and you'll be just fine.

What is Midnight Monitor: Aldercourt?


Midnight Monitor: Aldercourt is a "walking simulator" anomaly spotting game, heavily inspired by creepy internet stories around the Backrooms, the concept of Liminal Spaces, and other games of this genre such as "The Exit 8".

In Midnight Monitor: Aldercourt, you will need to watch your surroundings for any changes (big or small) as you loop through the Station. Anything can change - Walls and windows can appear, gravity can change, people can act strangely... And your life could be in danger.

Play Time

The game features 40+ anomalies for players to find with an approx. playtime of 15 Mins - 2 Hours. Completionists may opt to find every anomaly.

Is Midnight Monitor: Aldercourt scary?

There are some mild jumpscares depending on how sensitive you are to sudden changes.

Is Midnight Monitor: Aldercourt a complete game?

Midnight Monitor: Aldercourt is a complete game. Some additional anomalies may be added in the future, but it is releasing feature-complete.

How does Midnight Monitor: Aldercourt tie into the Midnight Monitor series?

The security firm "Sequre" featured through Midnight Monitor: Anomaly Watch features again in this game with some small callbacks to "Anomaly Watch". The plan is to continue growing the Midnight Monitor ethos as the series grows.

item.title: Burning Wall
item.description:
About This Game

The burning wall is behind you and you will not let go, try to reach the exit by showing skill and accumulating wealth.

Run away from the burning wall for as long as possible.
Collect different bonuses to help you in your escape.
Buy upgrades to increase your speed and aggression.

item.title: Kottabos VR
item.description:
About This Game

This is a VR trip into the ancient world – playing Kottabos, the all-time favorite Greek party game. All the items you see around you are 3D reconstructions of actual ancient furniture, pottery, and Kottabos targets from museums. This historical game is harder than it looks!

In ancient Greece Kottabos was a popular party game in which players threw the dregs from the bottom of their cup at targets. These included a disk on the top of a pole and cups floating in a bowl of water. They competed for adoration, praise, and respect of the other party-goers.

Prove your skill by throwing the dregs of wine from your cup at the metal disk on the pole in front of you, or fling your drops at the little cups floating in a bowl. If the disk or the cups go down, your luck goes up! A round of applause, an extra dessert, or the favor of Aphrodite herself will come to the winners.

Game Features:
  • Physics-driven gameplay in VR.
  • Controller momentum and trigger button throws the dregs.
  • Aim at the different targets, and get higher scores based on strength of hit and placement on the target.
  • Three different levels of gameplay.
  • Tutorial level.
  • Track your high scores.
  • Educational! Learn about Kottabos, the real Greek party game.
  • Free! Use for classes.

Project Team:
  • Aiden Gohlke – Lead Game Design and Programmer, Kennesaw State University
  • Donovan Lott – Lead Game Design and Programmer, Kennesaw State University
  • Jake Lewis – Student Game Design and Programmer, Kennesaw State University (2022)
  • Dr. Sandra Blakely – Project Director, Emory University, Department of Classics
  • Dr. Joanna C. Mundy – Project Manager, Digital Projects Specialist, Emory Center for Digital Scholarship
  • Dr. Joy Li – Game Development Collaborator, Kennesaw State University, Assistant Professor of Computer Game Design and Development
  • Craig Brasco – Visual Interface Collaborator and Illustrator, Kennesaw State University, Assistant Professor of Art | Graphic Communications
  • Hakeem Thomas – Student Game Design and Programmer, Kennesaw State University (2021)

item.title: the head well lost
item.description:
About This Game

Story:

When Francis matched with Rai on a dating app, the fact that he's half of the electronic pop duo DRYDEN should have been the most shocking part. Despite the hiccups that naturally occur when a quiet librarian and an internationally famous music producer collide, they hit it off and eventually decide to meet up. The moment Rai takes off the futuristic helmet he’s known for always wearing, he reveals to Francis his biggest secret: he is actually a Dullahan, a mythical being who has no head.

While lugging around her own emotional baggage, can Francis make a relationship work with this nice young man who also happens to be a headless pop star?

- - -

Features:

  • Over 140,000 words
  • 9 different endings
  • A heavily electronic, hip-hop soundtrack
  • 3 very cute cats — as you progress, unlock special scenes from the cats' POV
  • the majority of the most emotionally charged scenes occur at Waffle House

Please Take Note:

the head well lost is a commercial otome game with one character route that takes place over the course of about a year. Francis and Rai start dating fairly early on in the game. Thus, the maintenance of the relationship is the main point, not the pursuit.

Due to the nature of Rai's job, he and Francis are not always together. This is especially true for about the first half of the game. As a result, a good chunk of the story occurs through text messages and phone calls.

Content warnings: There are a handful of fade-to-black, text-only references to consensual sex. There are also textual depictions of legal alcohol consumption and some violence.

item.title: FOR HONOR™
item.description:
About This Game

MASTER THE ART OF BATTLE


Feel the power of every strike with the highly technical Art of Battle control system. Wield your blade according to your style: swift Assassin, tanky Heavy, versatile Vanguard, or technical Hybrid.

A NEVER-ENDING GAME


Enjoy an ever-evolving experience with more than 30 heroes, five factions, 18 maps, seasonal events, thousands of gear items, cross-platform play, and more!

PERSONALIZE YOUR HEROES


Unlock rewards and customize your heroes with thousands of different weapons, emblems, and more!

MEMORABLE STORY CAMPAIGN


Storm castles and fortresses in massive battles and confront bosses in intense duels.


Choose the Ultimate Edition to get the best experience, with 12 additional heroes!

item.title: Creation of a god
item.description:
About This Game

Creation of a god

...When the last King gave up the Crown the world was reset. The glow pierced the darkness. The portals to Divine Ascension will be restored. A young warrior suddenly woke up in his tent. It was time to challenge a God...

The game mixes elements of platforming, puzzles and combat in a tormented world ruled by a mysterious God. Only the most daring will be able to move forward and conquer the golden crown!

The game mixes turn-based strategy elements with real-time game mechanics.
-During your adventure you will have to solve puzzles using the power of the Crown. With it you can move allies on the board and use the power of the gods'cards.
There are 10 types of allies that you can move on the board and you will have to take advantage of their characteristics to progress through the levels.
-The world will be full of enemies to defeat in real time. In addition to melee, you will be able to learn 12 spells during the journey. Spells will allow you to have a great advantage during battles.
At the end of each world a boss will try to stop you from continuing. You will have to defeat him to continue!
-There will be many types of traps on the path. Some traps are specific to the type of world you will be in. For example, you will find giant skulls in the Arcane Desert or spore shooters in the Cursed Forest.

-more than 80 levels

-approximately 10 hours of gameplay

-two possible endings

-original soundtrack (80 min)


...Lost dreams echo in deep space. They can only be reached during eclipses...
